column1: 0827|twenty-seven minutes past eight|Even dawdling over breakfast with my mother just killed an hour
column2: and though I hadn't planned to be at Marge's until nine
column3: I was knocking on her door at twenty-seven minutes past eight.

column1: 0827|almost eight-thirty|The lecture was to be given tomorrow
column2: and it was now almost eight-thirty.
